SQL.LOAD: SELECT user_id, notification_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, user_notification_id FROM elp_user_notification WHERE user_notification_id = :user_notification_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select count(*) from elp_notification n where notification_id not in ( select notification_id from elp_user_notification un where un.notification_id = n.notification_id and un.user_id =:user_id) and n.notification_begin_date >= sysdate and n.notification_end_date <= sysdate
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_user_notification ( user_id, notification_id, created_by, user_notification_id ) VALUES ( :user_id, :notification_id, :created_by, :user_notification_id )
SQL.USER_NOTIFICATIONS_COUNT: select count(*) from elp_notification n where notification_id not in ( select notification_id from elp_user_notification un where un.notification_id = n.notification_id and un.user_id =:user_id) and n.notification_begin_date <= sysdate and n.notification_end_date >= sysdate and n.enabled ='Y' --dynamic_where_clause
